LanguageData.KilledChild.stages.killed_a_child.label: 아이를 죽임
LanguageData.KilledChild.stages.killed_a_child.descri: Killing one so young feels wrong, no matter the situation.
LanguageData.MyBirthMotherDied.stages.my_birth_mother: My birth mother died. She's gone forever. It's like a hole in my life.
LanguageData.MyBirthMotherLost.stages.my_birth_mother: My birth mother has been lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
